name: G.I.F.T
description:
A strategic game about a G.I.F.T - Browser playable link here

Please note that our zip file does not run in browser as of right now. If you want to play the game, you can either download the  ZIP file, unpack it, then use a tool like the  Chrome web server extension to host the file. We also uploaded the project here so that you can play it without downloading it (might require a page reload due to the image streaming too slowly :P)

Sorry for the inconvenience!
